00021 using Gtk;

00038 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00039     public delegate void FileSendEventHandler (object sender, string path, bool isDir);
00040 
00042     public class FolderViewer : RefreshableViewer {
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PUBLIC Events
00045         // ============================================
00047         public event ObjectEventHandler DirectoryAdded = null;
00049         public event ObjectEventHandler FileAdded = null;
00051         public event StringEventHandler FolderRefresh = null;
00053         public event FileSendEventHandler FileSend = null;
00055         public event BoolEventHandler DirChanged = null;
00057         public event RightMenuHandler RightMenu = null;
00059         public event StringEventHandler SaveFile = null;
00060 
00061         // ============================================
00062         // PROTECTED Members
00063         // ============================================
00064         protected FolderStore store;
00065         protected UserInfo userInfo;
00066 
00067         protected DirectoryInfo currentDirectory;
00068         protected string baseDirectory;
00069 
00070         // ============================================
00071         // PRIVATE Members
00072         // ============================================
00073 
00074         // ============================================
00075         // PUBLIC Constructors
00076         // ============================================
00078         public FolderViewer (UserInfo userInfo) {
00079             // Initialize UserInfo
00080             this.userInfo = userInfo;
00081             if (this.userInfo == MyInfo.GetInstance()) {
00082                 baseDirectory = Paths.UserSharedDirectory(MyInfo.Name);
00083             } else {
00084                 baseDirectory = "/";
00085             }
00086             currentDirectory = new DirectoryInfo(baseDirectory);
00087 
00088             // Initialize Folder Store
00089             this.store = new FolderStore();
00090             this.store.DirectoryAdded += new ObjectEventHandler(OnStoreDirAdded);
00091             this.store.FileAdded += new ObjectEventHandler(OnStoreFileAdded);
00092 
00093             // Initialize Icon View
00094             iconView = new IconView(store);
00095             iconView.TextColumn = FolderStore.COL_NAME;
00096             iconView.PixbufColumn = FolderStore.COL_PIXBUF;
00097             iconView.SelectionMode = SelectionMode.Multiple;
00098 
00099             // Initialize Icon View Events
00100             iconView.ItemActivated += new ItemActivatedHandler(OnItemActivated);
00101             iconView.ButtonPressEvent += new ButtonPressEventHandler(OnItemClicked);
00102 
00103             // Initialize Icon View Drag & Drop
00104             iconView.EnableModelDragDest(Dnd.TargetTable, Gdk.DragAction.Copy);
00105             iconView.DragDataReceived += new DragDataReceivedHandler(OnDragDataReceived);
00106 
00107             // Add IconView to ScrolledWindow
00108             Add(iconView);
00109 
00110             // Refresh Icon View
00111             Refresh();
00112         }
00113 
00114         ~FolderViewer() {
00115             // Folder Store
00116             this.store.DirectoryAdded -= new ObjectEventHandler(OnStoreDirAdded);
00117             this.store.FileAdded -= new ObjectEventHandler(OnStoreFileAdded);
00118 
00119             // Icon View Events
00120             iconView.ItemActivated -= new ItemActivatedHandler(OnItemActivated);
00121             iconView.ButtonPressEvent -= new ButtonPressEventHandler(OnItemClicked);
00122 
00123             // Icon View Drag & Drop
00124             iconView.DragDataReceived -= new DragDataReceivedHandler(OnDragDataReceived);
00125         }
00126 
00127         // ============================================
00128         // PUBLIC Methods
00129         // ============================================
00131         public void GoUp() {
00132             // Directory's Path
00133             if (currentDirectory == null || baseDirectory == null)
00134                 return;
00135 
00136             // Set New Current Directory & Refresh Folder Viewer
00137             currentDirectory = currentDirectory.Parent;
00138             Refresh();
00139 
00140             // if Current Directory = Home Directory Stop Up (false)
00141             if (DirChanged != null) DirChanged(this, CanGoUp());
00142         }
00143 
00145         public void GoHome() {
00146             // Directory's Path
00147             if (currentDirectory == null || baseDirectory == null)
00148                 return;
00149 
00150             // Set New Current Directory & Refresh Folder Viewer
00151             currentDirectory = new DirectoryInfo(this.baseDirectory);
00152             Refresh();
00153 
00154             if (DirChanged != null) DirChanged(this, false);
00155         }
00156 
00158         public override void Refresh() {
00159             // Directory's Path
00160             if (currentDirectory == null || baseDirectory == null)
00161                 return;
00162 
00163             // Clear The Store
00164             store.Clear();
00165 
00166             if (this.userInfo == MyInfo.GetInstance()) {
00167                 // MyFolder
00168                 this.store.Fill(currentDirectory.FullName);
00169             } else {
00170                 // Peer Folder
00171                 if (FolderRefresh != null) FolderRefresh(this, currentDirectory.FullName);
00172             }
00173         }
00174 
00176         public void Fill (string path, string fileList) {
00177             currentDirectory = new DirectoryInfo(path);
00178 
00179             string[] flist = fileList.Split('\n');
00180             foreach (string fileInfo in flist) {
00181                 if (fileInfo == "" || fileInfo == null || fileInfo.Length == 0)
00182                     continue;
00183 
00184                 string[] file = fileInfo.Split('|');
00185                 if (file[1].Equals("0")) {
00186                     store.AddFile(file[0]);
00187                 } else {
00188                     store.AddDirectory(file[0]);
00189                 }
00190             }
00191 
00192             this.ShowAll();
00193         }
00194 
00196         public bool CanGoUp() {
00197             return(!currentDirectory.FullName.Equals(baseDirectory));
00198         }
00199 
00200         // ============================================
00201         // PROTECTED (Methods) Event Handlers
00202         // ============================================
00203         protected void OnDragDataReceived (object sender, DragDataReceivedArgs args) {
00204             // Get Drop Paths
00205             object[] filesPath = Dnd.GetDragReceivedPaths(args);
00206 
00207             if (this.userInfo == MyInfo.GetInstance()) {
00208                 // Copy Selected Files Into Directory
00209                 foreach (string filePath in filesPath) {
00210                     FileUtils.CopyAll(filePath, currentDirectory.FullName);
00211                 }
00212 
00213                 // Refresh Icon View
00214                 Refresh();
00215             } else {
00216                 // Send Files
00217                 foreach (string filePath in filesPath) {
00218                     PeerSocket peer = (PeerSocket) P2PManager.KnownPeers[userInfo];
00219                     bool fisDir = FileUtils.IsDirectory(filePath);
00220     
00221                     Debug.Log("Send To '{0}' URI: '{1}'", userInfo.Name, filePath);
00222                     if (FileSend != null) FileSend(peer, filePath, fisDir);
00223                 }
00224             }
00225 
00226             Drag.Finish(args.Context, true, false, args.Time);
00227         }
00228 
00229         protected void OnItemActivated (object sender, ItemActivatedArgs args) {
00230             // Get File Path & IsDirectory Flag             
00231             bool isDir = store.GetIsDirectory(args.Path);
00232             string path = store.GetFilePath(args.Path);
00233             
00234             if (isDir == true) {
00235                 // Replace Parent With Path and ReFill The Model
00236                 currentDirectory = new DirectoryInfo(path);
00237 
00238                 // Refresh FileStore
00239                 Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate { Refresh(); });
00240 
00241                 // Sensitize the up button
00242                 if (DirChanged != null) DirChanged(this, true);
00243             } else if (userInfo == MyInfo.GetInstance()) {
00244                 try {
00245                     // Try To Open This File
00246                     System.Diagnostics.Process.Start(path);
00247                 } catch (Exception e) {
00248                     Debug.Log("Failed Process.Start() {0}: {1}", path, e.Message);
00249                 }
00250             }
00251         }
00252 
00253         protected void OnItemClicked (object sender, ButtonPressEventArgs args) {
00254             if (iconView.SelectedItems.Length <= 0)
00255                 return;
00256 
00257             if (args.Event.Device.Source != Gdk.InputSource.Mouse)
00258                 return;
00259 
00260             if (args.Event.Button == 3) {
00261                 PopupMenu menu = new PopupMenu();
00262 
00263                 // Options
00264                 if (this.userInfo == MyInfo.GetInstance()) {
00265                     AddSendFileMenu(menu);
00266                     menu.AddImageItem(Gtk.Stock.Remove, new EventHandler(OnFileRemove));
00267                 } else {
00268                     menu.AddImageItem(Gtk.Stock.Save, new EventHandler(OnFileSave));
00269                 }
00270 
00271                 // Start Right Menu Event
00272                 if (RightMenu != null) RightMenu(this, menu);
00273 
00274                 menu.Popup();
00275                 menu.ShowAll();
00276             }
00277         }
00278 
00279         protected void OnStoreFileAdded (object sender, object arg) {
00280             if (FileAdded != null) FileAdded(this, arg);
00281         }
00282 
00283         protected void OnStoreDirAdded (object sender, object arg) {
00284             if (DirectoryAdded != null) DirectoryAdded(this, arg);
00285         }
00286         
00287         // ============================================
00288         // PROTECTED (Methods) Menu Event Handlers
00289         // ============================================
00290         protected void OnFileSave (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00291             foreach (TreePath treePath in iconView.SelectedItems) {
00292                 string fpath = store.GetFilePath(treePath);
00293                 if (SaveFile != null) SaveFile(this, fpath);
00294             }
00295         }
00296 
00297         protected void OnFileRemove (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00298             foreach (TreePath treePath in iconView.SelectedItems)
00299                 FileUtils.RemoveAll(store.GetFilePath(treePath));
00300             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate { Refresh(); });
00301         }
00302 
00303         protected void OnFileSend (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00304             ExtMenuItem item = sender as ExtMenuItem;
00305             PeerSocket peer = (PeerSocket) P2PManager.KnownPeers[item.ExtraData];
00306             
00307             // Send File Event if Peer != Null
00308             if (peer != null) {
00309                 foreach (TreePath treePath in iconView.SelectedItems) {
00310                     string fpath = this.store.GetFilePath(treePath);
00311                     bool fisDir = this.store.GetIsDirectory(treePath);
00312                     if (FileSend != null) FileSend(peer, fpath, fisDir);
00313                 }
00314             }
00315         }
00316 
00317         // ============================================
00318         // PRIVATE Methods
00319         // ============================================
00320         private void AddSendFileMenu (PopupMenu menu) {
00321             if (P2PManager.KnownPeers == null) return;
00322             if (P2PManager.KnownPeers.Count <= 0) return;
00323 
00324             PopupMenu subMenu = new PopupMenu();
00325             menu.AddImageItem("Send", subMenu);
00326 
00327             foreach (UserInfo userInfo in P2PManager.KnownPeers.Keys) {
00328                 ExtMenuItem item = new ExtMenuItem(userInfo.Name, userInfo);
00329                 subMenu.AddItem(item, new EventHandler(OnFileSend));
00330             }
00331         }
00332 
00333         // ============================================
00334         // PUBLIC Properties
00335         // ============================================
00337         public UserInfo UserInfo {
00338             get { return(this.userInfo); }
00339         }
00340 
00342         public FolderStore Store {
00343             get { return(this.store); }
00344         }
00345     }
